name: react-meli
description: A React mini-app to search for products on MercadoLibre.

scripts.build:watch: NODE_ENV=develop watchify -t [ babelify ] -p [ bundle-collapser/plugin ] src/js/index.js -o build/bundle.js -d
scripts.build: NODE_ENV=production browserify -t [ babelify ] -p [ bundle-collapser/plugin ] src/js/index.js -o build/bundle.js
scripts.dist: npm run build && uglifyjs build/bundle.js -m -o build/bundle.min.js
scripts.release: npm run dist && gzip -9 build/bundle.min.js &&  mv build/bundle.min.js.gz build/bundle.min.js

author: Guille Paz <guille87paz@gmail.com>
